name: Galactic Wars Nokia 3310 Edition
description:
Submitted for https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

Controls:

  • Arrows - Up/Down
  • Space - Shoot Laser

Collectibles:

  • Coin - 200 points
  • U Symbol - Upgrade to your ship (increasing fire rate and bullet speed)

Each killed enemy give you 100 points. The more points you have, the harder the game will be.
